org.dmd.dms
Class SchemaManager

java.lang.Object
  org.dmd.dms.SchemaManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
DmcNameResolverIF
public class SchemaManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements DmcNameResolverIF

The SchemaManager class manages the elements that comprise schemas: types, attributes, classes and schemas themselves.

schemaBeingLoaded

public void schemaBeingLoaded(SchemaDefinition sd)
                       throws ResultException
This method is called from the DmsSchemaParser to alert us that a new schema is about to be read.

sd - The schema about to be loaded.
Throws:

definitionPreAdd

public void definitionPreAdd(DmcUncheckedObject def)
                      throws DmcValueException
Calls the schema extensions with this definition so that they can add auxiliary information if required.

Parameters:
def - the definition about to be added.
Throws:
DmcValueException

schemaPreAdd

public void schemaPreAdd(DmcUncheckedObject sd)
                  throws ResultException,
                         DmcValueException
This method is called from the DmsSchemaParser to alert us that a new schema is about to be read. We check the schema for any schemaExtension attributes and, if we find any, attempt to instantiate the extension class (if we don't already have it). As well, we ensure that the schemas required for the schema extension are loaded.

Parameters:
sd - The schema about to be loaded.
Throws:
ResultException
DmcValueException

manageSchema

public void manageSchema(SchemaDefinition sd)
                  throws ResultException,
                         DmcValueException
This function integrates a new set of definitions into the schema manager.

Parameters:
sd - The schema definition to be managed.
Throws:
DmcValueException

ResultException

isType

public TypeDefinition isType(java.lang.String name)
This function indicates if the specified string the name of a TypeDefinition.

Parameters:
name - the name of a suspected type definition.
Returns:
If the name is a type, its TypeDefinition is returned; otherwise null is returned.

isAttribute

public AttributeDefinition isAttribute(java.lang.String name)
This function indicates if the specified string the name of an AttributeDefinition.

Parameters:
name - the name of a suspected attribute definition.
Returns:
If the name is an attribute, its AttributeDefinition is returned; otherwise null is returned.

isAction

public ActionDefinition isAction(java.lang.String name)
This function indicates if the specified string the name of an ActionDefinition.

Parameters:
name - the name of a suspected action definition.
Returns:
If the name is an action, its ActionDefinition is returned; otherwise null is returned.

isClass

public ClassDefinition isClass(java.lang.String name)
This function indicates if the specified string the name of a ClassDefinition.

Parameters:
name - the name of a suspected class definition.
Returns:
If the name is a class, its ClassDefinition is returned; otherwise null is returned.

isSchema

public SchemaDefinition isSchema(java.lang.String name)
This function indicates if the specified string the name of a SchemaDefinition.

Parameters:
name - the name of a suspected class definition.
Returns:
If the name is a schema, its SchemaDefinition is returned; otherwise null is returned.

isDefinition

public DmsDefinition isDefinition(java.lang.String name)
This function indicates if the specified string the name of any class, attribute or type definition.

Parameters:
name - the name of a suspected definition.
Returns:
If the name is that of any kind of definition, the definition is returned as a generic object; otherwise null is returned.

addDefinition

public void addDefinition(DmsDefinition def)
                   throws ResultException,
                          DmcValueException
Attempts to add the specified definition. If the definition clashes with any existing definition, we throw an exception.

Throws:
DmcValueException
DmcValueExceptionSet
ResultException

Returns the definition with the specified name if it exists.

findNamedObject in interface DmcNameResolverIF

getDict

public Dictionary getDict()
If the global dictionary hasn't been created, it's generated from the hash of all identifiers.

diff

public void diff(SchemaManager predecessor,
                 java.lang.StringBuffer sb)
Performs a diff between this schema and the one passed as argument. The schema passed in is assumed to be a predecessor of this schema.
